features: ※4.3 inch color LCD screen※.The colors are rich, and the game details are perfectly displayed.It is a multifunctional game, not only for playing games, but also for watching movies, listening to music, it is one of the best casual electronics, perfect for indoor and outdoor, and one of the best gifts to give.

※Built-in classic games※.There are 3000 free classic games built-in, enter "Game" in the lower left corner of the screen, select "Local Disk" and enter, you will see different folders with many games in it.

※How to quickly find the game you want to play※? Connect the game console to the computer, find the "GAME" folder of the game console on the computer, users can create another folder in the "GAME" folder, such as "My Favorite", and then copy the game files you like to in this folder. Next time you can find the game you want to play directly in this folder.

※The game can be archived※.When the game cannot continue, press the "ESC" key, you will see the game menu, you can save the game,Next time you can continue playing with your saved progress without having to start over.This is a very friendly and applicable function.
※Support a variety of simulators※. Support a variety of simulator games, allowing players to have more choices, a game console is equal to many game consoles in the past.

※Games can be added or deleted※. In addition to the games on the desktop, other games can be added or deleted (need to be connected to the computer to operate), which is convenient for players to choose their favorite games.
※Support TV output※. You can connect the TV via AV cable, play games, watch videos/pictures on the TV, and share happiness with your family/friends.

※Support video and audio※. In addition to playing games, you can also watch videos, listen to music, read e-books, and support TF card expansion. It is one of the best entertainment electronics, perfect for leisure, outdoor or travel.
※Built-in lithium battery※. Built-in rechargeable lithium battery, which lasts longer, can be recharged repeatedly, and is very environmentally friendly.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The following content can help users quickly use the product. If you have any other questions, please send an email. How to set the game console language? Select "Setting"---"System" on the screen,press A key to enter, press A key to enter you will see multiple languages, select the language you want and press A key to confirm.

How to find more games in consoles? X7 version 1: In addition to the games displayed on the screen, there are many more games built into the console. Select "Game"---"Local Disk" on the screen and press the A key to enter, you will see many folders, after entering the folder you can see more games. X7 version 2: If there are many emulator icons on the screen, select one of them and press A to enter, the user will see many games. If the game is stored on a TF card, select "Other" and press A to enter and see the game. There are too many games,how to quickly find the game you want to play? Connect the game console to the computer, find the "GAME" folder of the game console on the computer, users can create another folder in the "GAME" folder, such as "My Favorite", and then copy the game files you like to in this folder. Next time you can find the game you want to play directly in this folder.The path to enter "My Favorite" : Tool--File Management--Local--GAME--My Favorite.

How to save/exit the game progress? When playing the game, press the "ESC" key, the game menu will appear on the screen, select "Save", and then press the A key. The game can save up to 3 progresses, and users can load different progresses to continue playing the game.if user select "Exit",he can exit the game.

How to add/delete games/videos/music/e-books? Connect the game console to the computer, find the "GAME"/"MOVIE"/"MUSIC"/"EBOOK" folder of the game console on the computer, copy the game/video/music/e-book files to the corresponding folder, and also Game/video/music/ebook files can be deleted from these folders.

How to download more games? What formats of games can be added? This game console cannot be connected to the Internet. Users can surf the Internet on the computer, search and download games on Google or other websites. Currently, only supports adding game files with suffix .gba/.gbc/.gb/.nes/.sfc/.bin/.smd, the game files must be copied to the ''GAME' folder in the console. If some games cannot be opened, the file information may be missing, you can delete it and download it again.

How to connect the TV? The game console can be connected to the TV through the AV cable, and select the corresponding signal source on the TV, then select and press the A key on the game console screen to enter "Setting"---"Displsy", press the A key to enter, and then select "PAL" ” or “NTSC” (depending on your country’s TV system).

How to enter/pause/exit the game game? After selecting the game, press the A button, then press the START or A button. Different games need to press the button several times. If you want to pause the game, press the SELECT key; to exit the game, press the SELECT key, and select "Exit" in the menu to exit the game. How to backup game files? Connect the game console to the computer, and find the "GAME" folder of the game console on the computer. We strongly recommend that users copy the "GAME" folder to the computer to prevent game files from being lost. Users can also delete unwanted games so that the console will run faster. Charging Instructions It is recommended to use a charger that does not exceed 5V2A for charging. The indicator light is red when charging, and blue when fully charged. If you find that it cannot be charged, please replace the charger or charging cable. The function of ABXY? A key: confirm or attack; B key: return or attack; X key: jump or attack; Y key: jump or attack;

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I was very happy with this x7, it has all the good game from the best platforms! My kids are good ng to love these when they open them Christmas morning, this will be there first game, waiting on 2 more to arrive, we got one for all 4 kids. My only complaint is that this one did not come with the AV Jack to the TV but it's okay I still feel it is very well worth it it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Imagina recibir una consola de juegos con un cargador equivocado. Que clase de broma es esta nisiquiera mi niño ah podido usarla porque el cargador que trae no es el de la consola ahora díganme que piensan hacer al respecto?

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Bought for my 7 year old
reviews.reviewText: It’s a knock of Nintendo with games already built in. The graphics are like a play station 2. Not bad at all. But I will say the steps to get to a game are a little harder for younger kids. So many clicks to get there. The buttons are backwards too. A is like X. But over all I think my kid will love it for Christmas. I git it as a test to see if he’ll take care of it and next Christmas he can get a real Nintendo. Came with half charge. Came with a charger and cheep ear buds.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 20, 2023
